ValidationRule.description: If the Type value is equal to "Regression Test" or "User Story Test", the Environment field must have a value.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( copado__Environment__c ), OR(ISPICKVAL( copado__Type__c , "Regression Test"), ISPICKVAL( copado__Type__c , "User Story Test")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Environment field is required if the Type is "User Story Test" or "Regression Test".
